actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reduce from three months to twelve weeks the period of active duty which a member of the Reserves must serve before being entitled to reemployment rights.

summary.text: Increases from three consecutive months to 12 consecutive weeks the period of active duty which a member of the Reserves must serve to be entitled to veterans' reemployment rights.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reduce from three months to twelve weeks the period of active duty which a member of the Reserves must serve before being entitled to reemployment rights.
